name: Zomato Restaurants Data
data_intro: The collected data has been stored in the Comma Separated Value file Zomato.csv. Each restaurant in the dataset is uniquely identified by its Restaurant Id. Every Restaurant contains the following variables:

cat_feature_intro.Restaurant Name: â€¢	Restaurant Name: Name of the restaurant
cat_feature_intro.Address: â€¢	Address: Address of the restaurant
cat_feature_intro.Locality: â€¢	Locality Verbose: Detailed description of the locality
cat_feature_intro.Locality Verbose: â€¢	Locality Verbose: Detailed description of the locality
cat_feature_intro.Cuisines: â€¢	Cuisines: Cuisines offered by the restaurant
cat_feature_intro.Has Online delivery: â€¢	Has Online delivery: yes/ no
cat_feature_intro.Switch to order menu: â€¢	Switch to order menu: yes/no
cat_feature_intro.Rating color: â€¢	Rating color: depending upon the average rating color

num_feature_intro.Restaurant ID: â€¢	Restaurant Id: Unique id of every restaurant across various cities of the world
num_feature_intro.Country Code: â€¢	Country Code: Country in which restaurant is located
num_feature_intro.Longitude: â€¢	Longitude: Longitude coordinate of the restaurant's location
num_feature_intro.Latitude: â€¢	Latitude: Latitude coordinate of the restaurant's location
num_feature_intro.Average Cost for two: â€¢	Average Cost for two: Cost for two people in different currencies ðŸ‘«
num_feature_intro.Price range: â€¢	Price range: range of price of food
num_feature_intro.Aggregate rating: â€¢	Aggregate Rating: Average rating out of 5
num_feature_intro.Votes: â€¢	Votes: Number of ratings casted by people
